string.name: crash_event
string.value: Click to build application crash event

string.name: freeze_event
string.value: Click to build application stuck event

string.name: system_kill_event
string.value: Click to build the system to investigate and kill events

string.name: application_fault_description
string.value: Click to build an abnormal event. After 3 seconds, the system abnormal event will be triggered. You need to restart the application and enter this page to obtain the reason for the last abnormal exit

string.name: crash_event_message
string.value: After 3 seconds, the system crash event will be triggered, and the application needs to be restarted to enter this page to obtain the last login exception information

string.name: freeze_event_message
string.value: After 3 seconds, if the system freezes, the application needs to be restarted and this page should be accessed to obtain the last login exception information

string.name: system_kill_event_message
string.value: The system has not supplemented the killing system enumeration type and it is difficult to build a system killing exception scenario. This scenario is not currently provided
